statements: SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, device_id, interaction_time FROM audit_trails WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_data FROM audit_trails WHERE interaction_type = 'login'
SELECT id, device_id, interaction_time FROM audit_trails WHERE interaction_data ->> 'result' = 'success' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01' AND interaction_time < '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, device_id, interaction_type FROM audit_trails WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT interaction_time, interaction_data->>'action' FROM audit_trails WHERE interaction_type = 'click'
SELECT id, interaction_time, interaction_data->'ip_address' AS ip_address FROM audit_trails WHERE interaction_data->>'status' = 'success'
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM audit_trails GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM IoT_device_audit_trail WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, interaction_type FROM IoT_device_audit_trail WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM Device_info WHERE firmware_version = 'v2.0';
SELECT id, activity_timestamp FROM IoT_device_audit_trail WHERE interaction_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM Device_info WHERE last_interaction_timestamp < '2022-02-01 12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM IoT_device_audit_trail WHERE user_id = 'a1c6f81d-2f2e-4b4d-aee0-7475011f0200';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM IoT_device_audit_trail GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM IoT_device_audit_trail GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, interaction_details FROM Device_info JOIN IoT_device_audit_trail ON Device_info.device_id = IoT_device_audit_trail.device_id;
SELECT * FROM Device_info WHERE last_interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY last_interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE device_id = 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, interaction_type FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, model, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs WHERE action = 'login' AND user_id = 123456 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp, details FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM compliance_logs WHERE action = 'Update';
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, MAX(id) AS max_id FROM audit_trail;
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC, production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM device ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE interaction_type='Login';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location FROM device WHERE device_type='Mobile' AND manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT compliance_id, interaction_id, device_id, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY compliance_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE interaction_type = 'login';
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM device ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_details FROM interaction_log WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, location FROM device WHERE device_type = 'phone' AND manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT compliance_id, compliance_status, compliance_details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'pending' ORDER BY compliance_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, device_type, registration_date FROM devices WHERE registration_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, email, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type, serial_number FROM devices WHERE registration_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users INNER JOIN device_users ON users.id = device_users.user_id WHERE device_users.access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT id, interaction_type, interaction_data FROM audit_logs WHERE interaction_type = 'click' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT u.user_name, a.action, a.timestamp FROM users u JOIN access_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.timestamp >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY a.timestamp ASC;
